projects.title: Sure-Odds
projects.intro: The project is a free to play sports pickem contest, where users can participate in various contest and win prices.

projects.title: AI Text Summarizer
projects.intro: AI Text Summarizer is a web app that uses advanced natural language processing to condense long articles, documents, or web content into clear, concise summaries.

projects.title: AI Face Recognition App
projects.intro: The AI Face Recognition app allows users to upload a photo or take a picture directly within the app to analyze facial features. It then detects the user's age and gender based on the facial data.

projects.title: Task tracker
projects.intro: A basic app for users to add, view, and manage tasks. Each task includes a title, description, and a status (e.g., to-do, in-progress, completed).

projects.title: Animation Project
projects.intro: The project is a simple animation project that uses HTML, CSS, and js. The purpose of the project is to practice my animation with css and js.

projects.title: Github Finder
projects.intro: The application helps you search github users and some of their repositories.

projects.title: Calorie Tracker
projects.intro: This is a nutrition app that helps users keep track of their calorie intake.

projects.title: Komos.io
projects.intro: This is a comedy event discovery app that gives information about the events, and so much more, built with Angular.
